attributes.action: Revoke the lockdown implemented on November 5th
attributes.additional_details: The lockdown has huge health, social and economic costs associated with it that were justified to the public on the basis of claims made, which false and known to be untrue before the decision to implement lockdown was made. Any cost benefit case justifying the lockdown is now null and void and the cost to the British public cannot be justified.
attributes.background: Immediately revoke the lockdown implemented on November 5th along with all restrictions imposed on the British indiviuals and businesses associated with the lockdown

rejection.details:
Lift local lockdowns and Covid-19 restrictions in England
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551469

Repeal second National Lockdown
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557045
